data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value: Welcome to SaloonOS! The system is operational.

data.name: ApiKeyMissing
data.value: API Key was not provided in the X-Api-Key header.

data.name: ApiKeyInvalid
data.value: The provided API Key is invalid or does not correspond to an active tenant.

data.name: ShopNotFound
data.value: The requested shop could not be found.

data.name: ForbiddenAccess
data.value: You are not authorized to access this resource.

data.name: ServiceNameRequired
data.value: Service name is required.

data.name: ServicePriceInvalid
data.value: Service price must be greater than zero.

data.name: ServiceDurationInvalid
data.value: Service duration in minutes must be greater than zero.

data.name: ServiceCreatedSuccessfully
data.value: The service has been created successfully.

data.name: ServiceNotFound
data.value: The requested service could not be found within your shop.

data.name: ServiceUpdatedSuccessfully
data.value: The service has been updated successfully.

data.name: ServiceDeletedSuccessfully
data.value: The service has been successfully deleted.

data.name: StaffMemberNameRequired
data.value: Staff member name is required.

data.name: StaffMemberCreated
data.value: Staff member has been successfully added to your shop.

data.name: BusinessCategoryRequired
data.value: Please select a business category for your shop.

data.name: PaymentAmountInvalid
data.value: Payment amount must be a positive value.

data.name: PaymentTokenInvalid
data.value: The provided payment token is invalid or has expired.

data.name: PaymentSuccessful
data.value: Payment was processed successfully.

data.name: PaymentFailed
data.value: Payment processing failed. Please check your details and try again.
